SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

me.prettyprint.hom.annotations
Annotation Type AnonymousPropertyHandling

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface AnonymousPropertyHandling

Annotation for marking the method used to add "anonymous" properties to the POJO. Anonymous properties are Columns in Cassandra that do not map directly to the POJO. See HectorObjectMapper for details.

Author:
Todd Burruss

Required Element Summary
 String adder
           
 String getter
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends me.prettyprint.hector.api.Serializer> serializer
          The optional Serializer to use when converting anonymous property value to/from byte[].
 Class<?> type
          The type of the anonymous property values.
 

Element Detail

adder

public abstract String adder

getter

public abstract String getter

type

public abstract Class<?> type
The type of the anonymous property values. Defaults to byte[].

Returns:
Default:
byte[].class

serializer

public abstract Class<? extends me.prettyprint.hector.api.Serializer> serializer
The optional Serializer to use when converting anonymous property value to/from byte[]. If not specified, BytesArraySerializer is used.

Returns:
serializer type
Default:
me.prettyprint.cassandra.serializers.BytesArraySerializer.class
